[[Category:Crafting]]
[[File:TheWorkbench1.PNG|thumb|Crystal Workbench]]
__TOC__
==Description==
The crystal workbench is a crafting workbench that can be used to create [[Slayer Armor]] with gargish runes. In order to create a crystal workbench, you need 9 of each of the colors of the [[Crystal_Workbench#Crystal Shards| crystal shards]] and 115.0 [[Tinkering]] crafting skill . A workbench needs to be locked down first before it can be used!

[[File:Workbench1.PNG|335px|Workbench Gump]]
[[File:CrystalWorkBenchTinkering1.png|360px|Tinkering Menu]]
[[File:CrystalWorkBenchTinkering2.png|450px|Tinkering Materials]]

==Crystal Shards==
Crystal shards from from crystal that can be mined in a [[Random Dungeon Adventure]]. The crystals require 120 [[Mining]] skill to mine.  Each crystal that is mined will provide one color of crystal shards, the color that you will get is able to be seen in the center of the crystal you are mining. 

'''Crystal Colors:'''
* Purple
* Pink
* Green
* Light Green
* Yellow
* Orange
* Aqua
* Turquois
* Blue

[[File:CrystalWorkbench1.jpg|335px|Crystals to Mine]]
[[File:CrystalShard1.PNG|Crystals Shards]]

==Notes==
* It is not known at this time if mining gloves can be used as a buff to mine the crystals.
* Currently there is a display bug in the tinkering menu that only shows 6 of the 9 required crystals.
